programme.desc: Grill master Spencer Watts shows us four ways to barbeque a classic. Succulent, tender, mouth-watering ribs.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbecuing bananas, that's crazy. Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill the delicate, evERS-scrumptious fruit. Bananas.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when it's grilled to perfection

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbeque is all about sauces, rubs and marinades

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Salsa that will Dance on Your Tongue
programme.desc: Salsa means undeniable flavour! Lively host Spencer Watts plays with sweet, salty, and spicy in four amazing salsa recipes.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt Dunigan hits the soccer field at a local youth soccer tournament. After some fancy footwork he leaves the field and hits the grill to cook up some Slo-Smoked Saucy Ribs, some Cheesy Bacon Potato Skins, and Chicken on a stick with Home Made Plum Sauce

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team BBQ into the night at a small town country fair. Lamb Souvlaki pita with a Tzatziki Sauce, Slo-Smoked Brisket, Bacon Wrapped Grilled Corn and Caramel Kettle Corn are serious competition for the midway.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his BBQ team hit the soft sand under the hot summer sun and treat the beach lovers to some great food that can be eaten on the go - Blackened Scallops with Avocado Salsa, Slo-Smoked Beef Ribs, Flank Steak Fajitas, and Watermelon Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt, Karrie, Jenna and Charlotte are 'Team Road Grill' at a fundraiser ball hockey tournament. They fire it up and serve the players Grilled Lamb Chops with Mint Pesto sauce, Slap shot Smoked Chicken, Power Play Crab cakes, and a Pear and Fennel Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team "drop in" on a group of thrill seeking skydivers at a Skydiving Jamboree. They let the BBQs rip and grill up three different kinds of wings - smoked, jerked and 'suicide hot'. Then they cool things down with an asparagus cucumber salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team put the pedal to the metal at the Go Kart Track. They crank up the heat on the grills and pull out all the stops making Summertime Pizza, Sticky BBQ Chicken, Smoked Turkey Pastrami Sandwiches and a Summer Mellon Ball Salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a Costume Party he's bravely entrusted his buddy Jim to pick out their outfits. With a menu of slow smoked Thai ribs, cinnamon chicken and snapper in parchment paper, Rob's skill at the grill is unmasked

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's time for Rob's long awaited pool party. His friends sun by the pool, while Rob makes a splash at the grill with turkey burgers, slow smoked beef ribs, roasted tomato salad and grilled chicken with spicy pine nut crust.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Hold your Horse"...shoes! Rob hosts his annual Horseshoe BBQ tournament, and grills up a southern feast. He and his ring of friends devour delicious smoked rotisserie pig, lemon ginger chicken drumsticks and roasted peppers stuffed with corn.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: On your mark, get set, grill! Rob hosts an Olympic celebration and serves up a gold medal meal of stuffed veal chops, smoked leg of lamb, grilled pesto peppers and a cool summer salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends catch a wave of good times and good food at his Surf & Turf BBQ. They feast of crab legs, roasted leg of lamb, a bucket of clams and the biggest thickest steak you ever did see!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team grill up a feast for some hungry athletes at the Ultimate Frisbee Tournament. Jumbo shrimp with a rosemary dry rub, Slo-smoked Pork Butt in a Papaya Marinade, and Asian Pasta Salad have the athletes asking for more.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Antique Steam train is in town! Matt and the team give the crowd something to chew-chew on with delicious Grilled Vegetable Quesadillas, Honey Mustard Chicken Drumsticks, Grilled Turkey Burgers with Pineapple Salsa, and Grilled Corn with Orange Butter

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill team follows him to the baseball diamond and together they treat the ball players to two kinds of mini burgers, some triple play stuffed veal, Mushroom Fricassee on a baguette, and Homerun Mixed Smoked Nuts.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team lend a hand at a Habitat for Humanity building site to feed hungry volunteers. Matt and the team make some delicious Brick Chicken, some Maple Wood Planked Pork, Steak Sandwiches, and Blue Cheese and Bacon Potato Salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Going once, going twice, gone. Rob and his friends are donating their special keepsakes to a Silent Auction to raise money for charity. They head over to Robs for a quick and delicious pre-auction chowdown that includes lemon pepper Cornish Hens, sweet monkfish, chili lime shrimp and stuffed pork tenderloin.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes to Rock and Roll all night and BBQ every Saturday. This time he rocks out with his buddy Jim's Band "Giver". While they belt out the tunes, Rob creates his own hits with grilled lamb chops, crispy potato skins, beef brisket and smoked Proscuitto wrapped shrimp.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Ole! Rob serves up a Spanish Tapas BBQ that includes spicy lamb ribs, beef tenderloin, blackened scallops, proscuitto wrapped figs stuffed with blue cheese and gazpacho vodka in cucumber cups. The portions are small, but the taste is huge! And that's no bull.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes clowning around, but he is the Ringmaster of his own Carnival Day BBQ. After a fun day at the fair, Rob keeps the party going with a fairground finger food like pizza burgers, homemade pogos, pork ribs and cool iced tea.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends are hitting the bike trails. After a long bike ride, Rob grills up a high protein meal of veal ribs, steelhead trout, southwestern black bean salad and pistachio and honey crusted lamb racks.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: The liquor cabinet is getting too full so Rob is throwing a Boozy BBQ with the left over spirits from parties past. He pulls together a feast of tequila chicken breasts, white wine veal chops, martini and grilled tarragon mushrooms.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.desc: On a visit to Hawai, the land of the Mishmi tribe, Roshni stays with some members of the tribe, who treat her to a rather potent local brew.

programme.title: Off The Grid Libreville, Gabon
programme.desc: The capital of Gabon, Libreville offers an off the grid route to the host Emeline. From the scenic trails of Pongara National Park to exciting beach experiences, Libreville comes across as a pleasant surprise. But what’s more exciting is watching a number of sea turtles making their nests and hatching eggs near the beach. Emeline’s quest also leads her to a tête-à-tête with a conservationist where she learns about saving turtles.

programme.title: Burn Appetit

programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Austrian Alps' most highly glaciated section, Zillertal offers Jolly the thrills of winter in summer.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 City Breaks Belfast, Ireland
programme.desc: Join our host in Belfast, as she explores a city dotted with Victorian buildings to vibrant streets. Starting from City hall to visiting RMS Titanic Museum in this episode of City Breaks.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: The abundant natural and man-made wonders of Norway tell stories of its long and rich history.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Burn Appetit Ziller Valley, Austria
programme.desc: On his way from Zillertal to Innsbruck, Jolly makes some rather fascinating pit-stops that lead him to uncover shades of Austria’s heritage.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 City Breaks Munich, Germany
programme.desc: Often called Germany's most livable city, Munich is also one of its most historic, artistic, and entertaining cities. Until 1871, it was the capital of an independent Bavaria. Kristina Guberman admires the elegance of the city through its attractions such as the Gothic city palace, Residenz, the popular Marienplatz square and the stylish BMW Museum.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 World Spas Mines Wellness, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Shirodhara is a traditional Ayurvedic oil drip treatment that popular world traveler, Jamie Srubis tries at the Mines Wellness Resort in Malaysia. Following this, she tries other treatments such as Urut Melayu, a full body massage which derives its technique from a traditional Malay martial art, and Acupuncture and Moxibustion, the two oldest treatments of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.desc: Attending a tea festival in Pasighat gives Roshni the chance to savour some of the most premium varieties of tea produced in Arunachal Pradesh.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.title: Kissed By the Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta’Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Burn Appetit Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: City breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 City breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Stories of king Timur’s reign and the Silk road lie in the mosaic-covered masterpieces of ancient Samarkand.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Unwind The Palace Downtown, Dubai
programme.desc: Be it the world’s tallest building or one of the world’s largest man-made marinas, Dubai has always been a city firmly in charge of writing its own story. Renowned traveler, Sabrina discovers this, as she visits Dubai’s own tropical rainforest and a wildlife sanctuary that is home to wild flamingos. She also learns about the city's roots at Bastakiya, the old quarter full of sand-colored houses with open courtyards and narrow alleyways, and Al Fahidi Fort, the city's oldest structure.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.desc: From paragliding to ziplining, the adventures Roshni has in Mechuka give her an intense adrenaline rush.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan
programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Landmarks Dead Sea, Jordan
programme.desc: Find out some of the most fascinating facts about the lake in southern Israel where it is nearly impossible to drown.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kissed By The Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Penghu, an archipelago of islands in Taiwan, is a tropical haven infused with oriental flavour. Travel junkie, Alex Drobin discovers this when he enjoys the balance between adventures such as snorkelling and banana boat and exploring the local culture through sights rife with local legends such as a temple dedicated to the goddess of the sea and the Four eye well. He also tries fresh seafood and local Taiwanese dishes such as cactus ice cream.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Xp Guide Prague, Czech Republic
programme.desc: Catch the beauty of Prague through its fascinating history, its classic mix of Gothic and Renaissance architecture and more.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 City Breaks Cologne, Germany
programme.desc: Christina visits the 2000 year old city of Cologne and delves into museums dedicated to chocolate to museums showcasing world's greatest art.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 City Breaks Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Unwind Hotel Ellbee, India
programme.desc: Rishikesh, the heartland of yoga, is widely known for mystical stories, spiritual awakenings, rejuvenation and peace. Travel enthusiast, Larissa D’Sa comes to Rishikesh looking for a relaxing getaway, and loses herself in its natural beauty. From relishing earthy Garhwali flavours to witnessing the larger-than-life Ganga aarti, her experiences in the land, where great sages and famous musicians came to find peace, help her to unwind.

programme.desc: Step into the wilds of Loango where you’ll see unique lowland gorillas, elephants and wild buffaloes blissfully strolling in their natural habitats.

Amidst the various moods of the caldera, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore the unique experiences this caldera has to offer.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Burn Appetit Rattenberg, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: With cold weather closing in, Babsi and Jacopo race to finish their climb. Hard climbs and freezing temps test their strength. Will they reach the top before time runs out?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Seb Bouin climbs his tough DNA (9c) route in France with tricky moves and tiny holds. This hard challenge shows he pushes the limits of what people can do on rock.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbers Leo, Anna, and jungle expert Waldo take on Mount Roraima’s steep prow. They aim to climb a new, tough route. Will they reach the top or face the mountain’s challenge?

programme.title: Dirtbag: The Legend of Fred Beckey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dirtbag: The Legend of Fred Beckey
programme.desc: Fred Beckey, the legendary 'Dirtbag' mountaineer, inspires with his daring climbs and bold lifestyle. Learn about his pioneering ascents and the legacy that makes him a climbing icon.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: After three tough climbs, Anna Taylor faces the hardest pitch yet. She must succeed to keep the team’s dream of a free climb alive. Will she make it or fall short?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbing legend Chris Sharma finds a mega project in Siurana, Spain. The Sleeping Lion wakes his fierce side as he takes on one of his toughest climbs yet.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Alex Honnold tackles a brutal 35-mile solo climb with 24,000ft of gain and hundreds of pitches on Red Rock Canyon’s rough sandstone walls. Can he finish this epic challenge alone?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Alex Honnold finishes nine climbs under the hot sun. With nine more to go, he faces Red Rock Canyon’s hardest climb as night falls.

programme.title: Wild Waters
programme.desc: Nouria Newman, the world’s top kayaker, is an Extreme Kayaking Champion and the first woman to conquer Salto del Maule in Chile. She’s always breaking records and pushing the limits of the sport.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Australian star Angie Scarth-Johnson teams up with climber Hazel Findlay to tackle Mallorca’s best deep-water soloing routes. It’s a thrilling mix of skill and adventure in stunning locations!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Angie Scarth-Johnson tackles a climbing challenge where every move counts, in the high-stakes world of Psicobloc competition, she must balance mental strength with physical skill to succeed.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Blind adventure athlete Erik Weihenmayer climbs a massive rock face in the Sierra Nevada. With camera work and animation, the film brings to life a concept by adaptive climbing pioneer Timmy O’Neill.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Japanese climbing legend Sachi Amma goes from three-time world champ to purist, finishing with a bold first ascent on Japan’s Mt. Mizugaki. Don’t miss this epic journey!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: At 42, climber Chris Sharma takes on his toughest challenge with the first ascent of Black Pearl in Mallorca, pushing the limits of deep water soloing in this test of skill, strength and resilience.

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Brave teams race to keep their crazy homemade flying machines in the air over the Ohio River in Louisville, USA. Who will stay flying the longest?

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: A strong headwind tests homemade flying machines as teams push their skills to the limit, battling both the weather and gravity. Can they make it fly?

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Teams build crazy homemade flying machines, from Tim Burton-inspired saucers to exploding volcanoes, all trying to stay in the air over Victoria Harbour in Hong Kong. Who will stay flying the longest?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S10 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The judges are waiting to see incredible creativity and speed as racers race their homemade soapbox cars in Iowa, USA. Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S10 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The funny race with no engines and lots of obstacles. Have the teams built their homemade soapboxes well enough to reach the finish line, or will the course stop them?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Fearless teams race through tough obstacles in their engineless machines at the Red Bull Soapbox Race 2022 in Spa, Belgium. Don’t miss the excitement!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Who will win in today’s gravity-powered race? The answer lies in Toulouse! May the pink city inspire strength and courage in all the brave participants. Don't miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: See 2015’s top soapbox racers, from a clever steampunk dragon to an Indiana Jones ride and a smart Albert Einstein car. Which one races best? Find out in this fun, fast showdown.

programme.title: Valley Uprising
programme.desc: The unforgettable story of Alex Honnold rock climbing in Yosemite National Park: 50 years of battling gravity and breaking rules. Don’t miss this epic journey!

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: GKA & GWA - Best Of World Cup Cape Verde
programme.desc: Cape Verde is blessed with a moderate climate, north-easterly trade winds and warm ocean swells that break on the islands' reefs, making it a paradise for Kite-Surfing and wingfoiling. Sal island in particular boasts one of the world's greatest right-hand point-breaks.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 5
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Three world titles were up for grabs in Verbier today with the familiar combination of nerves and excitement always present at this legendary venue, and the world's best did not disappoint.

programme.title: Total Fight 2019 - Snowboard - Grandvalira (AND)
programme.desc: Total Fight is an invitational international competition directed to the best riders in the international freeski and snowboard scene. They fight in a battle for the best style in the "El Tarter Snowpark", one of Europe's best Areas for freestyle action.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn Pro (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 6
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Kahuna
programme.desc: Four young engineering students set sail from Lorient, France, in March 2022 aboard Kahuna, their self-built electric sailboat. For five months, they explored the Arctic slopes of Norway and Svalbard, mastering skiing, sailing, filming and climbed 40 peaks.

programme.title: Beach Wrestling World Series Finals 2022
programme.desc: Eight world champions to be crowned in fifth and final leg of the 2022 Beach Wrestling World Series in Constanta, Romania, on September 3 to 4. 120 beach wrestler from fight for this years world champion titles in different weight classes.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 - Season Recap
programme.desc: An epic season of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 has come to an end and we take a look back at the highlights of the tour. So enjoy the water-Action of some of the best freestyle windsurfers of the world.

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #02
programme.desc: This will focus on our Continental Cups of Halfpipe and Slopestyle at Cardrona Alpine resort and will feature not only kiwi Olympians, but also Junior World Champions Ruby Andrews and Gustav Legnavsky, as well as international stars.

programme.title: S'abandonner au Sauvage
programme.desc: S'abandonner au Sauvage is an adventure in total autonomy without any canoeing experience on the waters of an over 500km long canadian river.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)

programme.title: ON Surf

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: For this route from Ruhpolding (GER) to Kasern (ITA), 210 kilometers and more than 10000 meters of vert, recreational athletes need approximately five to seven days. Benedikt Boehm is aiming for the magic time limit of 36 hours, non-stop.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)

programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya

programme.title: Searching for the Rivergod II

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #1 & #2

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Mid Season Recap
programme.desc: Die ersten Events der European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 sind vorbei und wir werfen einen Blick zurück auf die besten Windsurfer der Welt und ihre epischen Tricks auf dem Wasser.

programme.title: Canyoning 2008
programme.desc: Canyoning is one of the most exciting outdoor sports and for many it is a true decathlon of extreme activities. Physical fitness, team spirit and trust are of the utmost importance.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 2, Germany FIBO Power

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 4, Finland

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 5, Holland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: The SCL is in full swing and the sixth stage takes place in Latvia where the men are eager to break a national record held here

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 7, Portugal
programme.desc: The competition continues in Portugal with 6 events and thousands of spectators

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 8, Croatia
programme.desc: Episode 8 takes place in 36 degree heat in Croatia and sees the return of Krzysztof Radzikowski after a 2 month absence due to injury

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 9, Poland
programme.desc: SCL returns to Poland with 12 athletes all battling for the number one title

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary
programme.desc: The 10th stage takes place in Hungary and features new super talent!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The welterweight superfight between former GLORY world champion Endy Semeleer (36-2, 18 KO) and current GLORY lightweight world champion Tyjani Beztati (26-4, 9 KO) will take center stage in the main event of the evening. After dominating the lightweight division, Beztati moves up to welterweight for the very first time in his GLORY career. GLORY featherweight world champion Petch (169-40-3, 27 KO) and RISE national champion Kento Haraguchi (25-3-1, 14 KO) made their trilogy fight official for the co-main event. Two former middleweight title challengers collide as the number one ranked Michael Boapeah (17-4-1, 7 KO) takes on the number three ranked Ulric Bokeme (32-5, 17 KO), both...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The main event will see two of the light heavyweight division’s most explosive young prospects clash as Romania’s Stefan Latescu (17-3, 8 KO) faces Turkey’s Cem Caceres (16-1, 13 KO). Belgium based Albanian Berjan Peposhi (29-4, 16 KO) will compete in the co-main event. The always exciting featherweight welcomes rising star Ayoub Bourass (14-1, 4 KO) in to make his GLORY debut. International Muay Thai superstar Youssef Boughanem (188-43-8, 120 KO) returns for his sophomore GLORY outing against tough Italian Angelo Volpe (38-5, 12 KO). Former middleweight title contender Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-10, 36 KO) takes on Antwerp’s own Jente Nnamadim (21-5, 11 KO), who comes in to make his GLORY...

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 K1 World Grand Prix: Final 14, Osaka, 2003
programme.desc: K-1 World Grand Prix 2003 Final Elimination was a kickboxing event promoted by the K-1 organization. The event was held at the Osaka Dome in Osaka, Japan on Saturday, October 11, 2003 in front of 31,700 spectators. It was the final elimination competition for the K-1 World Grand Prix 2003, involving fourteen fighters from across the world, with all bouts being fought under K-1 Rules (100 kg/156-220 lbs). The fourteen fighters were a mixture of invitees or had qualified via previous events.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Dean Schmeichel has been coaching for over 20 years. Despite the allure of working as a full time wrestling coach in the martial arts industry, he has instead dedicated himself to work with kids and coaching school sports. Wrestling continues to be an interal part of Dean's life, and he finds the most satisfaction in helping athletes to understand and fall in love with the sport, as he did.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E234 Dholi Beats S1 E234
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E234 King of Hearts S1 E234
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E234 Second Chances S1 E234
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E28 Jodha Akbar S3 E28
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E234 This is Fate S1 E234
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E234 Undercover Love S1 E234
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

It’s round 3, it’s Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series West.
